DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate non-inferiority ritonavir-boosted GS-9137 relative ritonavir-boosted Comparator Protease Inhibitor use part combination antiretroviral regimens subject fail , fail , protease inhibitor therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Ritonavir-Boosted GS-9137 vs. Ritonavir-Boosted Protease Inhibitor ( ) Combination With Background ART .
DOC.criteria: HIV RNA great equal 1000 c/mL . Failed/Failing protease inhibitor base antiretroviral therapy . Stable antiretroviral therapy great equal 30 day prior screen . Negative Serum Pregnancy Test . GFR Cockcroft Gault great equal 80 mL/min . AST & ALT less equal 2.5x ULN . Total Bilirubin less equal 1.5 mg/dL . Albumin great 3.5 mg/dL . Prothrombin Time INR 1.01.4 Platelets great equal 50,000 . Hemoglobin great equal 8.0 mg/dL . Absolute Neutrophil Count great equal 1000 . New AIDS define condition within 30 day baseline . Prior treatment HIV1 integrase inhibitor ( except patient 183101 ) . Ascites encephalopathy . Breast Feeding . Cancer Diagnosis ( besides Kaposi Sarcoma Basal Cell Carcinoma ) .
